amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the Interior Department to proceed with updating royalty rates and valuation for federal coal, oil, and gas by striking Section 440.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in House Report 114-683 to allow the Interior Department to proceed with updating royalty rates and valuation for federal coal, oil, and gas by striking Section 440.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 246 (Roll no. 435).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 246 (Roll no. 435).
